plot outline: The story revolves around an young couple, Ann (Miya) and Freddy Abraham (Padmasoorya), who marry against the wishes of their parents. They are on the verge of celebrating their first wedding anniversary. Ann is a journalist, a dedicated one at that who is adept at digging out the trickiest of mysteries. Ravi (Lal) a family friend of the couple. Freddy finds a book, gifted to Ann by a friend. The book take the movie forward as Freddy is immersed in it and finds a empathetic connection with the protagonist of the book.It leads him in to solving a mysterious case, which was remained unsolved for several years.
title: 32aam Adhyayam 23aam Vaakyam
plot: A book gifted to a couple engraves "23" in the husband's (Freddy) mind and he starts seeing it everywhere. When he discovers a striking similarity of the story with people in his life, he starts investigating.

The story revolves around an young couple, Ann (Miya) and Freddy Abraham (Padmasoorya), who marry against the wishes of their parents. They are on the verge of celebrating their first wedding anniversary. Ann is a journalist, a dedicated one at that who is adept at digging out the trickiest of mysteries. Ravi (Lal) a family friend of the couple. Freddy finds a book, gifted to Ann by a friend. The book take the movie forward as Freddy is immersed in it and finds a empathetic connection with the protagonist of the book.It leads him in to solving a mysterious case, which was remained unsolved for several years.
